dt: {bc}an image that shows the contents of a computer display

shortdef: an image that shows the contents of a computer display

dt: {bc}to capture a {d_link|screenshot|screenshot:1} of (an image on a computer display)

dt.t: "Amazing … Can you {wi}screenshot{/wi} that and send it to me?"
… while you can prevent someone from forwarding an email, you can't stop them from {wi}screenshotting{/wi} it and sending the image on.
The White House quickly deleted the tweet, but … somebody managed to {wi}screenshot{/wi} it first.

shortdef: to capture a screenshot of (an image on a computer display)
